Ability.Name: Sinister Strike
Ability.Lua:
local sinisterstrikeCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target")
if sinisterstrikeCP <= 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: SnD
Ability.Lua:
local sliceanddice, _, _, _, _, _, sliceanddicetimer = UnitBuffID("player", 5171)
if sliceanddice ~= nil then if sliceanddicetimer - GetTime() < 2 then return true end else return true end

Ability.Name: Eviscerate
Ability.Lua:
local eviscerateCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target")
if eviscerateCP == 5 then return true end

Ability.Name: Revealing Strike
Ability.Lua:
local revsCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target")
if revsCP == 4 then return true end

Ability.Name: Recuperate
Ability.Lua:
local _,_,_,recuperate = UnitBuffID("player", 73651) local recuperateCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local health = UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player") * 100
if recuperate ~= nil then return false else if health < 95 then if recuperateCP >= 4 then return true end end end

Ability.Name: Rupture
Ability.Lua:
local rupture, _, _, _, _, _, rupturetimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 1943, "PLAYER") local ruptureCP = GetComboPoints("player", "target") local hasCatMangle, _, _, _, _, _, CatMangleTimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 33876) local hasBearMangle, _, _, _, _, _, BearMangleTimer = UnitDebuffID("target", 33878) local hasTrauma = UnitDebuffID("target", 46857) local hasHemorrhage = UnitDebuffID("target", 16511)
if hasCatMangle ~= nil or hasBearMangle ~= nil or hasTrauma ~= nil or hasHemorrhage ~= nil then return false else if rupture ~= nil then if ruptureCP == 4 then if rupturetimer - GetTime() < 1 then return true end end else return false end end

Ability.Name: Shiv
Ability.Lua:
bDS = UnitBuffID("target", 8599) --Enrage
if bDS ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Feint
Ability.Lua: if IsShiftKeyDown() then return true end

Ability.Name: Tricks of the trade
Ability.Lua: local InParty = GetNumPartyMembers() if IsCtrlKeyDown() if InParty > 0 and UnitInRaid("player") == nil then for i = 1, InParty, 1 do local member = "party"..tostring(i) if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" then CastSpellByName("Tricks of the Trade") SpellTargetUnit(member) end end end end

Ability.Name: Adrenaline Rush
Ability.Lua:
local ARstart, ARduration = GetSpellCooldown(13750) local ARcooldown = (ARstart + ARduration - GetTime()) local levelcheck = UnitLevel("target") local Energy = UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player") * 100
if levelcheck == -1 or levelcheck >= 87 then if ARcooldown > 0 or Energy >=40 then return false else return true end end

Ability.Name: Killing Spree
Ability.Lua: if IsControlKeyDown() then return true end
